data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In your letter to the governor, be sure to use proper terms of address. Be ____ and ____, ____ don't ____ for ____ much. I ____ that ____ keep ____ letter ____, ____ she ____ have ____ many ____ by ____ time ____ gets ____ yours. If you follow these rules, you will have a better chance of receiving a favorable decision.
data.partBlankContent: In your letter to the governor, be sure to use proper terms of address. Be pol___ and mod___, a__ don't a__ for t__ much. I reco_____ that y__ keep yo__ letter br___, a_ she wi__ have re__ many let____ by t__ time s__ gets t_ yours. If you follow these rules, you will have a better chance of receiving a favorable decision.
data.fullContent: In your letter to the governor, be sure to use proper terms of address. Be polite and modest, and don't ask for too much. I recommend that you keep your letter brief, as she will have read many letters by the time she gets to yours. If you follow these rules, you will have a better chance of receiving a favorable decision.
data.answer: 在你写给州长的信中，一定要使用恰当的称呼。礼貌谦虚，不要要求太多。我建议你把你的信写得简短些，因为在她收到你的信的时候，她已经读了很多封信了。如果你遵守这些规则，你将有更好的机会得到一个有利的决定。
